topic: Methods for identifying cognitive biases through prompt analysis
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling prompts will reveal recurring themes and biases in my thinking, offering opportunities for self-reflection and innovation. As a next step, I will create a systematic approach to shuffle and document the outcomes of these combinations, analyzing any patterns that emerge to refine my creative process and expand my cognitive flexibility.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
